item.title: Probelm with something?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

Now I have another problem… :X
After I put in the barrows code, about 5 minutes into the server I keep getting this exception.

I think it’s either having a problem either getting the character files or using the command ::char.
It’s happened a few times though, and I’m pretty sure the ::char command is a coicedence. Since that was the only time the exception appeared after the command was used.
Any ideas?

sendMessage(“You have already killed Verac!”, 1078);

to

item.title: Probelm with something?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

I’m trying to add a realistic barrows, but I’m not really sure where to put the code, because I keep getting an error.

Heres the code I’m trying to place.

[code] if(objectID == 6823){
if(Verac == 1) {
sendMessage(“You have already killed Verac!”,

1078);
}
if (isBV == true) {
sendMessage("You have already woken up a

Verac!", 1078);
}
if(Verac == 0 && isBV == false) {
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2030, 3575, 9707,

heightLevel);
sendMessage("You Wake The Ancient Beast

Up!");
isBV = true;
}
}[/code]

client.java:3652: sendMessage(java.lang.String) in client cannot be applied to ( java.lang.String,int) sendMessage("You have already killed Verac!", 1078); ^ client.java:3655: sendMessage(java.lang.String) in client cannot be applied to ( java.lang.String,int) sendMessage("You have already woken up a Verac!", 1078); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Anyone know where I should put this code? Don’t say to replace it with sM because I am NOT using delta.

Read full topic
